Writer: Mark Steven Johnson (story), Mark Steven Johnson (screenplay), Steve Bloom (screenplay), Jonathan Roberts (screenplay), Jeff Cesario (screenplay)
Title: Jack Frost
Plot: A father who can't keep his promises, dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman, who has the final chance to put things right with his son, before he is gone forever.
Actors: Michael Keaton, Kelly Preston, Joseph Cross, Mark Addy
